divs: Sighting Details I am a 3 time witness. 1 first sighting 1997 I say said it was neckless of lights. I assessed in the 7 seconds of site that its flight pattern and appearance was not humanly precedented. Second sighting was the same kind as the most recent on which was described obove. Lasting only a few seconds, but as astounding as any of them in its flight movements. My biggest concern is my discovery that I unexplainably set off metal detectors and video securitythe later not consistantly please send me anything about the metal detector anomaly. PS. I have had a couple of Xrays paid for by the state but the last one I must somehow afford which is not presently possiblebefore I can see the results considering that I had no complant of injury. I did see something on the one photo Xray but did not take it home. Belive me I was discouraged from even caring about this but you... show me if I should.6-15-03 Elliot stearns
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cuba
This sighting has never been favorited.
